places.clubpetroDescription: Significant contributions to the management system of ClubPetro, a company responsible for accelerating results in over 1,200 fuel stations in Brazil. A comprehensive administrative system that handles all registration and user management, station management, programs, and loyalty flows.
places.letsDescription: Lets is a renowned software factory that has delivered hundreds of successful projects. During my journey here, I had the opportunity to collaborate with various multidisciplinary teams and use a wide range of technologies, always aiming for the highest level of quality in executed projects.
places.skolenDescription: Skolen is a startup created with the mission to revolutionize school management. Featuring a comprehensive system for managing students, classes, teachers, and monitoring engagement and reducing school dropout rates. I had the privilege of being involved in the development from the beginning, collaborating with a talented multidisciplinary team of programmers and designers.
